mapper.select:
select count(*) from c_dic_court
is_active = '1'
AND full_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND full_name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select , b.name as area_name from c_dic_court a, c_admin_area b
a.area_id = b.id
AND a.is_active = '1'
AND a.full_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by ${sortItem} ${sortOrder} limit #{startNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from c_dic_court where is_active = '1' AND full_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') limit 0, 10

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
